original_title: The Oscar Nominated Short Films 2014: Documentary
overview: Oscar nominated Documentary Shorts for 2014: "The Lady in Number 6: Music Saved My Life" (Directors: Malcolm Clarke and Nicholas Reed, Canada/USA/UK - English). "Karama Has No Walls" (Director: Sara Ishaq, UAE/UK/Yemen - Arabic). "Facing Fear" (Director: Jason Cohen, USA - English). "Cavedigger" (Director: Jeffrey Karoff, USA - English). "Prison Terminal: The Last Days of Private Jack Hall" (Director: Edgar Barens, USA - English).
title: The Oscar Nominated Short Films 2014: Documentary
